title: Scott Hobart from Giants Chair
itunes:title: Scott Hobart from Giants Chair
description:
A indie rock legend Scott Hobart from Giants Chair is on the podcast this week to discuss his bands new LP (spoiler alert, it's great!), his rural upbringing and of course, skateboarding. We also discuss the bands early touring days with Boys Life, Mineral and others. A real treat so listen up and enjoy. Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order. The best place for all of your VIP experiences at shows is with Soundrink. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
